content: i have been meaning to write a half_double_crochet half_double_crochet beanie pattern for some time now you all seem to really like my basic beanie pattern which uses double_crochet stitches so i thought you d also like a half_double_crochet beanie pattern half_double_crochet beanie pattern https //lovableloops com/patterns/half-double-crochet-basic-beanie/ video tutorial https //youtu be/dxr6aaxlnq4
